name: LACKING64
author: Archimare
description:
"LACKING64"
 because I’m an amateur (Passionate; Creating for fun), even thou I’m 
satisfied with the palette, there is always pleace for improvements. 
Based on oil paintings made by Michael C. Hayes and desaturated bright 
colors used by H.R. Giger. So aim is for Dark Fantasy and Cosmic Horror.
 After desaturating this palette it gives around 60 shades of gray 
(depending on the method), but those are quite close to each other. 
Therefore, there is a potential for it being friendly forcolorblindness,
 but it’s better to cut it in half.
